text.p: Summaries of English premier league matches played Wednesday: Arsenal 3 (Merson 44th minute, Keown 64th, Wright 77th) Chelsea 3 (Leboeuf penalth 6th, Vialli 30th, Wise 90th), Halftime 1-2. Attendance: 38,132. Blackburn 0 Leeds 1 (Harte 40th). 0-1. 23,226 Coventry 0 Liverpool 1 (Babb 68th). 0-0. 23,021. Derby 1 (Laursen 25th) Manchester United 1 (Beckham 38th). 1-1. 18,026 Everton 0 Aston Villa 1 (Ehiogu 62nd). 0-0. 39,115 Middlesbrough 4 (Emerson 12th, Mustoe 28th, Ravanelli 52nd, Stamp 81st) West Ham 1 (Hughes 57th). 2-0. 30,060 Southampton 2 (Dryden 53rd, Le Tissier 89th) Nottingham Forest 2 (Campbell 4th, Saunders 23rd). 0-2. 14,450 Sunderland 1 (Scott penalty 19th) Newcastle 2 (Beardsley 52nd, Ferdinand 62nd). 1-0. 22,037 Wimbledon 1 (Earle 3rd) Tottenham 0. 1-0. 17,506.
